channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Frail chimps headed from New Mexico to Louisiana sanctuary
item.description: About two dozen chimpanzees deemed too feeble to be moved a few years ago will be going to Chimp Haven after all. The NIH said originally they'd be kept in New Mexico for their own safety.
item.content:encoded:
About two dozen chimpanzees deemed too feeble to be moved a few years ago will be going to Chimp Haven after all. The NIH said originally they'd be kept in New Mexico for their own safety.

(Image credit: Kierstin Luckett)
item.dc:creator: Nell Greenfieldboyce

item.title: Do you have a loved one who votes differently than you? Tell NPR about it
item.description: Have you recently dumped a partner over their politics? Or chosen to stay friends with someone who voted differently this year? NPR wants to hear how politics have impacted relationships.
item.content:encoded:
Have you recently dumped a partner over their politics? Or chosen to stay friends with someone who voted differently this year? NPR wants to hear how politics have impacted relationships.

(Image credit: Paul Hennessy/Anadolu)
item.dc:creator: Claire Murashima

item.title: Why Trump won — 9 takeaways from the 2024 election
item.description: Trump not only won in the Electoral College, but he won so big that he expanded his coalition with historic demographic shifts.
item.content:encoded:
Trump not only won in the Electoral College, but he won so big that he expanded his coalition with historic demographic shifts.

(Image credit: Chip Somodevilla)
item.dc:creator: Domenico Montanaro

item.title: Honey, a new pygmy hippo just dropped! The quiz has your animal news covered
item.description: This week's quiz includes the great, the late and the clickbait.
item.content:encoded: This week's quiz includes the great, the late and the clickbait.
item.dc:creator: Holly J. Morris

item.title: Judge strikes down Biden program shielding immigrant spouses from deportation
item.description: A federal judge on Thursday struck down a Biden administration policy that aimed to ease a path to citizenship for some undocumented immigrants who are married to U.S. citizens.
item.content:encoded:
A federal judge on Thursday struck down a Biden administration policy that aimed to ease a path to citizenship for some undocumented immigrants who are married to U.S. citizens.

(Image credit: Evan Vucci)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Argentine prosecutors charge 3 people in connection with singer Liam Payne's death
item.description: Three people have been charged in connection with the death of Liam Payne, a former member of musical group One Direction who died after falling from his Buenos Aires hotel room balcony last month.
item.content:encoded:
Three people have been charged in connection with the death of Liam Payne, a former member of musical group One Direction who died after falling from his Buenos Aires hotel room balcony last month.

(Image credit: Natacha Pisarenko)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Notre Dame welcomes arrival of 3 new bells as cathedral reopening nears
item.description: The delivery of the bells comes just one month ahead of Notre Dame's reopening, which is scheduled for December 8.
item.content:encoded:
The delivery of the bells comes just one month ahead of Notre Dame's reopening, which is scheduled for December 8.

(Image credit: Christophe Ena)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Strong winds fuel rapid spread of wildfires in Southern California
item.description: A Southern California wildfire has destroyed more than 100 structures, mostly homes, in less than two days, fire officials said Thursday as raging winds were forecast to ease.
item.content:encoded:
A Southern California wildfire has destroyed more than 100 structures, mostly homes, in less than two days, fire officials said Thursday as raging winds were forecast to ease.

(Image credit: Noah Berger)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Racist text messages target young African Americans post-election
item.description: Federal, state, and local authorities are investigating the offensive messages that have been sent over the last two days.
item.content:encoded:
Federal, state, and local authorities are investigating the offensive messages that have been sent over the last two days.

(Image credit: Alex Brandon)
item.dc:creator: Debbie Elliott

item.title: Dozens of monkeys escape from South Carolina research facility
item.description: More than 40 monkeys are now roaming the streets of Yemassee, S.C., after staging an escape from a research facility.
item.content:encoded:
More than 40 monkeys are now roaming the streets of Yemassee, S.C., after staging an escape from a research facility.

(Image credit: Carrie Antlfinger)
item.dc:creator: Alana Wise
